<?php

/*
 * Helpers for quick easy use
 */

     function humanDate($string)
     {
          // returns string into 01 Dec 2000 for example
          return date('m M Y', strtotime($string));
     }

     function date_now()
     {
          // returns current time/date
          return date('Y-m-d H:i:s');
     }

     function lower($string)
     {
          // converts given string to lowercase
          return strtolower($string);
     }

     function seo($string)
     {
          // Little help to string replace  to SEO friendly URL
          return str_replace(' ', '-', $string);
     }

     function ago($string)
     {
          return \Carbon\Carbon::createFromTimeStamp(strtotime($string))->diffForHumans();
     }

<?php

abstract class Mailer {

    public function sendTo($user, $subject, $view, $data = [])
    {
         Mail::send($view, $data, function( $message ) use ($user, $subject)
         {
             $message->to($user->email)
                     //->from('noreply@')
                     ->subject($subject);
         });
    }

}
